Everything checks out.  And Tucson's strategy is derived from a TF Cybertro=
n episode where in order to defeat Unicron, Optimus and Galvatron realized =
they needed to team up to defeat him.  Till All Are One, was the theme of t=
heir. battle and thus Tucson has also come to a similar conclusion.  It app=
ears insane but it was something that had to be done despite the concern an=
d dislike of the strategy.  It wasn't an easy decision to make but Tucson s=
howed a great courage in doing things off the beaten path.  It's very obvio=
us that Rodimus is showing his weakness of self doubt which he's projecting=
 off of Tucson, who will have no part of such negativity.  It's not that he=
 hates Rodimus it's the fact that he knows Rodimus can overcome his apprehe=
nsions if he puts his mind to it.  So of course Tucson will sort of give hi=
m a swift nip at his backside in order to get his message across to Rodimus=
.  

But he too has a weakness, his beastly temper which he has had through=
out his life.  The temper of a creature who's breath can melt mountains, su=
pposedly.  The dragon was sort of Tucson's birth sign and it was no surpris=
e that he would become one later on in life.  

So it appears the two Prime=
s are at their greatest test.  They must both help each other to overcome a=
 lack of self confidence and learn to do things off the beaten path and at =
the same time, learn to quell a temper who's effects could have highly dest=
ructive consequences.  Good thing Leo Prime came into the picture because a=
s Rodimus and Tucson learn their hardest lessons he is there to keep things=
 stable between the factions.

So this is getting very interesting indeed. =
 It may take a while but eventually things will work out for everyone.

Per=
petually on the move and constantly busy. 

On Aug 11, 2011, at 7:48 AM, Su=
per Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:

> > OOC: He was passing bene=
ath Waspinator, on his way toward the dinosaurs.
> > Sorry about the mixup.=

> 
> OOC: No problem. I will ignore that from Nightshift then.
> 
> From m=
y understanding we have Nightshift, Straightshot, Elita plus
> Scourge and =
his sweeps all checking the dinosaurs trying to map out
> some of the dinos=
aurs, and posibly look for any kinds of strange
> signals like the ones rep=
orted before the maximals arrived.
> 
> Cyclonus and Rodimus are going to w=
ork together to trace down where
> the dinosaurs came from by following the=
 trail of destruction they
> left behind.
> 
> Hydras has called Sky Shadow=
 over for some sort of conference
> 
> And Tuscon is awaiting Leo's reinfor=
cements which are the Fuzors.
> 
> There are many other Predacons, walking =
crawling about around the
> dinosaurs themselves - burning them away.
> 
> =
Is there anything else that I have missed?
> 
> Today, or more likely tommo=
rrow I will do another small time jump as
> it will take the reinforcements=
 several hours to get to their
> location.
> 
> - Preston
> 

--Apple-Mail-86--241005664

      <p>> OOC:  He was passing beneath Waspinator, on his way toward t=
he dinosaurs.<br>
> Sorry about the mixup.<br>
<br>
OOC: No problem. I w=
ill ignore that from Nightshift then.<br>
<br>
From my understanding we hav=
e Nightshift, Straightshot, Elita plus<br>
Scourge and his sweeps all check=
ing the dinosaurs trying to map out<br>
some of the dinosaurs, and posibly =
look for any kinds of strange<br>
signals like the ones reported before the=
 maximals arrived.<br>
<br>
Cyclonus and Rodimus are going to work together=
 to trace down where<br>
the dinosaurs came from by following the trail of =
destruction they<br>
left behind.<br>
<br>
Hydras has called Sky Shadow ove=
r for some sort of conference<br>
<br>
And Tuscon is awaiting Leo's reinfor=
cements which are the Fuzors.<br>
<br>
There are many other Predacons, walk=
ing crawling about around the<br>
dinosaurs themselves - burning them away.=
<br>
<br>
Is there anything else that I have missed?<br>
<br>
Today, or mor=
e likely tommorrow I will do another small time jump as<br>
it will take th=
e reinforcements several hours to get to their<br>
location.<br>
